data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,464 believers in the state of Hamilton Municipality the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hamilton Municipality, Bermuda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 5,600 people living in Hamilton Municipality, Bermuda. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Hamilton Municipality, Bermuda.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,464 believers in Hamilton Municipality to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Hamilton Municipality to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Hamilton Municipality to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hamilton Municipality, Bermuda so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
